name: ECE 157
title: RF Hardware Design
description: Engineering design cycle for wireless and RF systems: design, practical hardware implementation, and prototype. (Formerly EE 157.)

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): ECE 101 and ECE 101L, ECE 103, and ECE 171, and ECE 174; or consent of instructor. Concurrent enrollment in ECE 157L is required.

class_notes: Concurrent enrollment in ECE 157L is required.
